metadata.title: CVE-2023-50431

platform: Open Enterprise Server 23.4
Open Enterprise Server 24.4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP4

metadata.description: sec_attest_info in drivers/accel/habanalabs/common/habanalabs_ioctl.c in the Linux kernel through 6.6.5 allows an information leak to user space because info->pad0 is not initialized.
